title: 666 Park Avenue
resume: What would you do to have everything you desire? Step inside 666 Park Avenue,  New York's most seductive address. We all have some burning needs,  desires and ambitions. For the residents of The Drake, the premier  apartment building on Manhattan's Upper East Side, these will all be met  – for a price – courtesy of the building's mysterious owner, Gavin  Doran. But be careful what you wish for, because the  price you have to pay is your soul.
